name: Skull Beanie with Visor
description:
This listing is for an awesome skull beanie with a visor, made with super soft acrylic yarn. No scratchy yarns to irritate little (and big!) heads. If your little guy or gal has a bit of a rocker or punk side to them they will love this hat! Show your fun and crazy side with this adorable skull motif beanie.

The eyes can be either crocheted or buttons.  If you have a preference please list your preference in "notes to seller" when you check out.

SIZES: Please choose size from drop-down menu below. If you can provide a head circumference measurement, I can assure an excellent fit.

Hand wash; lay flat to dry

Pattern by Crazysocks830.etsy.com
Photo credits: Jill Jacobs Photography jilljacobsphotography.com

name: Long tail stocking cap
description:
This soft snuggly Stocking Hat.  Perfect for a boy or girl!  Matching diaper covers also available (please message me for more info)!

A wonderful prop for newborn photo shoots.

Handmade with the softest cotton/acrylic blend yarn that is non-irritating.

COLORS: Choose 2 colors. I have dozens of colors in stock. If I don't have it, I'll go get it! 

SIZES: Please choose size from drop-down menu below. If you can provide a head circumference measurement, I can assure an excellent fit.

Please indicate your size & color preferences in the "notes to seller" when you check out.

If you have any questions, please contact me!

Hand washing is highly recommended, and lay flat to dry.

***Never leave a child unattended while wearing this hat***

name: Customizable Crazy Owl Hat
description:
This hat is hand-crocheted using super soft acrylic yarn. This hat would look adorable on a little boy or girl and would make a perfect photo shoot prop!

This little owl hat has "ears" that stand up when worn!  Super adorable on children or all ages!  (If you would like a teen/ adult size please message me)

COLORS: Choose 3 colors - one for the top, one for the bottom, and one for the eye color.

SIZES: Please choose size from the drop-down menu below. If you provide the child's age or head circumference also, I can ensure a perfect fit. [Contact me if you would like an Adult size hat.]

If you have any questions please let me know!

Pattern by CrazySocks830

name: Crocheted Baby Flip Flops
description:
These adorable little flip flops are perfect for a special little girl or boy! These are great as the weather gets warmer and you don't want to put shoes or socks on babies, but you don't want them to go out with bare feet either. They are super cute and made with super soft acrylic yarn. You will get TONS of compliments on them!

Hand wash, lay flat to dry.

COLORS: Choose 2 colors - one for the top and one for the bottom.  Please list your color choices at check out in the "message to seller" area.

SIZES: Please choose size from the drop-down menu below. If you provide the child's age or head circumference also, I can ensure a perfect fit. 

If you have any questions please message me.

Pattern by Cara Scofield
Photo credits: Jill Jacobs Photography jilljacobsphotography.com.

name: Crocheted Headband with Flower
description:
This is an adorable crocheted headband for the little princess in your life. This listing is for a newborn size headband in White, with a Large Pink Flower with a Green Center.

This is an adorable accessory for any little girls outfit.  
COLORS: Choose 2-3 colors. I have dozens of colors in stock. If I don't have it, I'll go get it! If you want me to match the hat to something specific, contact me first & send me a photo.

SIZES: Please choose size from drop-down menu below. If you can provide a head circumference measurement, I can assure an excellent fit.

Please indicate your size & color (headband, flower and center of flower) preferences in the "notes to seller" when you check out.

If you have any questions, please contact me!

Photo credits: Jill Jacobs Photography jilljacobsphotography.com.
